original_text: He will kill with the sword your daughters on the mainland. He will set up a siege wall against you and throw up a mound against you, and raise a roof of shields against you.
korean_text: 그가 들에 있는 너의 딸들을 칼로 죽이고 너를 치려고 사다리를 세우며 토성을 쌓으며 방패를 갖출 것이며

sentences.original_text: He will kill with the sword your daughters on the mainland.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 칼로 너의 딸들을 본토에서 죽이리라.

sentences.original_text: He will set up a siege wall against you
and throw up a mound against you
and raise a roof of shields against you.
